articles.title: Credit scores of millions of Americans have been exposed online - Techradar
articles.description: Lender used Experian's API to allow unauthenticated users to check credit scores
articles.content:
The credit scores of millions of Americans were left exposed online when a lender misused an API belonging to the credit reporting agency Experian.

articles.title: Dr. Scott Gottlieb says travel restrictions on India will have little impact on U.S. Covid cases - CNBC
articles.description: More Americans getting vaccinated against Covid is the best way to protect against the virus variant first identified in India, Dr. Scott Gottlieb told CNBC.
articles.content: The Biden administration's recently announced restrictions on travelers from India are unlikely to play a significant role in limiting new coronavirus cases in the U.S., Dr. Scott Gottlieb told CNBC … [+3732 chars]
